snippet: The abduction of 17 Turkish workers and their Iraqi translator from a construction site was seen by officials as the work of a criminal gang, not Islamic State militants.
abstract: Masked gunmen wearing Iraqi military uniforms kidnap 17 Turkish workers and their Iraqi translator in Baghdad; while incident is similar to one in which Islamic State kidnapped Turkish diplomats, kidnapping was probably carried out by gang or militia for ransom.
lead_paragraph: The abduction of 17 Turkish workers and their Iraqi translator from a construction site was seen by officials as the work of a criminal gang, not Islamic State militants.

headline.main: Masked Gunmen Kidnap 17 Turkish Workers in Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Masked Gunmen Kidnap 17 Turkish Workers in Baghdad

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
